entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 20 January 2023
